amendment.description: To require two reports on operation of the Federal Voting Assistance Program and the military postal system together with certain actions to improve the military postal system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3245 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3245 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bond. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To require two reports on operation of the Federal Voting Assistance Program and the military postal system together with certain actions to improve the military postal system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3245 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3245 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bond.
